info.name: Locatie Catalogus
info.description:
API Details
- Component: Locatie Catalogus
- Reference: lc
- Enviroment: dev
- Version: V.0.1
- Repository: [online](https://github.com/ConductionNL/Proto-component-commonground) / [zip](https://github.com/ConductionNL/Proto-component-commonground/archive/master.zip)
- Docker Image: [online](https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/conduction/lc-php) 
- Datamodel: [postman](/schema/lc.postman_collection.json) / [oas](/schema/openapi.yaml) / [pdf](/schema/datamodel.pdf) / [mwb](/schema/datamodel.mwb) 

'Naast deze JSON rest API is er ook een [graphql](/graphql) interface beschikbaar.'

item.name: Retrieves the collection of Place resources.

exec: pm.test("response should be okay to process", function () {
pm.test("response must be valid and have a body", function () {
// assert that the status code is 200
pm.response.to.be.ok; // info, success, redirection, clientError,  serverError, are other variants
// assert that the response has a valid JSON body
pm.response.to.be.json; // this assertion also checks if a body  exists, so the above check is not needed

header.description: The JWT of the entity performing the request
The version of the API conform [Landelijke API-strategie.](https://geonovum.github.io/KP-APIs/#versioning)
A  globally unique id of the request, which makes a request traceable throughout the network.
A process id for purpose registration (doelbinding)
A list of requested data elements
A key-value list of data subjects related to this request. e.g. `bsn=12345678, kenteken=ab-12-fg`
A clarification as to why a request has been made  (doelbinding)
A [websub](https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/#discovery) header like <https://hub.example.com/>; rel="hub"

query.description: An array of nested objects to include in the return object
An array of fields to return in output, wil return all fields is not supplied
Returns object as valid on a given date time
Returns objects valid from a given date time
Returns objects valid until a given date time

A clarification as to why a request has been made  (doelbinding)
A [websub](https://www.w3.org/TR/websub/#discovery) header like <https://hub.example.com/>; rel="hub"

pm.response.to.be.json; // this assertion also checks if a body  exists, so the above check is not needed

body.raw:
{
    "name": "My Place",
    "publicAccess": true,
    "smokingAllowed": false,
    "openingTime": "09:00",
    "closingTime": "22:00",
    "description": "This is the best place ever",
    "bagId": "0363200000218908",
    "url": "https://location.com",
    "telephone": "+31 (0)26 355 7772",
    "logo": "https://location.com/logo.svg",
    "photo": "https://location.com/photo.png",
    "hasMap": "https://location.com/map.pdf"
}

body.raw:
{
    "name": "My accomodation",
    "accommodationCategory": "wedding location",
    "floorSize": "20m^2",
    "petsAllowed": false,
    "wheelchairAccessible": true,
    "numberOfBathroomsTotal": 6,
    "floorLevel": 0,
    "maximumAttendeeCapacity": 20,
    "product": "https://example.org/products/1",
    "resources": ["https://example.org/resources/2"],
    "description": "This is the best accommodation ever",
    "place": "/places/{{place}}"
}
